records.name: Ecoboo Maldives

descriptions.direction: Located in Thinadhoo, Ecoboo Maldives is on a private beach. Thinadhoo Harbor and Felidhoo Harbor are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those wishing to experience the area's natural beauty can explore Aarah Island and Alimathaa. Take an opportunity to explore the area for water adventures such as swimming.
descriptions.general: Facing the beachfront, Ecoboo Maldives offers 4-star accommodation in Thinadhoo and has free bikes, garden and shared lounge. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features a kids' club, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests.
descriptions.other: Please note that couples with Maldivian nationality must present a marriage certificate upon check-in. Please note that the property is only accessible by Seaplane or Speedboat transfer.Please inform in advance of your expected arrival time. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

records.short_description: Original hotel with shuttle service, bike rent and meeting room
